articles.title: Apple might finally bring always-on display feature on upcoming iPhone 14 Pro, Pro Max smartphones - Deccan Herald
articles.description: American tech giant Apple’s upcoming iPhone 14 Pro and Pro Max smartphone might finally get the always-on display feature.  According to The Verge, a report states that Apple could introduce the feature with iOS 16, allowing the iPhone to display a limited am…
articles.content:
